item.title: Alerting
item.description: Best Practice for Alerting Monitoring data should at all times provide a bird’s-eye view of the overall health of a distributed system by recording and exposing high-level metrics over time across all components of the system. Monitoring data should at all times provide a bird’s-eye view of the overall health of a distributed system by recording and exposing high-level metrics over time across all components of the system. In the event of a failure, monitoring data should immediately be able to provide visibility into the impact of the failure as well as the effect of any fix deployed.
